pageProduct.name: Thompson's Organic Zinc 180 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Organic Zinc helps support immune function, healthy skin and minor wound healing.

Thompson's Organic Zinc helps support immune function and healthy skin. Zinc may assist in the healing of minor wounds, supports the health and function of the male reproductive system and helps in the improvement of general wellbeing.  It is also vital during life periods of growth and cell differentiation, such as pregnancy.

Size: 180tabs

Oil-Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Helps in the maintenance or improvement of general well-being.
• For mineral zinc supplementation.
• Helps to maintain immune function.
• Zinc supports healthy reproduction hormonal balance.
• Vegetarian/Vegan friendly.

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Use only as directed and always read the label.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each tablet contains
Zinc Gluconate 105mg
equiv. Zinc 15mg

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place. Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
